page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: Children play a variety of games in their spare time including{marbles and {skipping}games. {Cinderella}is a skipping game played by three or four people. One person skips while the others turn the rope and say the rhyme Cinderella dressed in yellow Went upstairs and kissed a fellow By mistake she kissed a snake How many doctors did it take? The persons turn ends when she does not jump over the rope and the number she is at is the number of doctors it takes to save her. {Gardening}is a common pastime with adults, particularly the men, who grow flowers and their own supply of vegetables. There are several{Football}teams in the village of both adults and children who take part in local league games with reasonable success.
